mapper.insert: INSERT INTO task(id, problemID, userID, judgeTime, answer, status, score) VALUES (#{id}, #{problemID}, #{userID}, #{judgeTime}, #{answer}, #{status}, #{score});
mapper.select: SELECT id, status, score FROM task WHERE problemID = #{problemID}
SELECT t.id, t.problemID, p.serial, p.name AS problemName, t.judgeTime, t.status, t.score FROM task AS t JOIN problem AS p ON t.problemID = p.id WHERE t.userID = #{userID}
SELECT t.id, t.problemID, p.serial, p.name AS problemName, t.judgeTime, t.answer, t.score, t.status, t.result FROM task AS t JOIN problem AS p ON t.problemID = p.id WHERE t.id = #{id}
